name: Tiny Battles
description:
Tiny Battles is a tactical action auto-battler where battles take place automatically in the arena.

BATTLES

Battles happen automatically:

STRATEGY IS THE PATH TO VICTORY

Build the right units for your strategy - early attack, midgame or consistent late game build with ultimate units for victory - the choice is yours.

COMBINE TROOPS

Each faction has multiple paths to victory. Brute force, artillery attack or summoning creatures.

STUDY YOUR OPPONENT

Each enemy commander and his race have strengths and weaknesses, study them to defeat them!


https://store.steampowered.com/app/2746200/Tiny_Battles_Prologue/
